name: Umbrella who?
description:
Tap to take off and tap to turn, thisgame is easy as pie to start playing but hard as XXXX to play!

You will get mad, andry and frustrated because it its NOT that easy as you think buy it´s super addictive so you cannot get this game out of you mind!

Try to tap into 100 score (heights) and see whats happen ther, it will be pretty cool!

Compete with other frustrated players from all over the world of your name up there on the highscore list!
